description: - Adjusted the volume of the tracks
title: Masked Jackal

description:
- Fixed inaccuracies in the drum track largely         related to the kick drum
- Changed the "Solo 2 - Outro" to triplets and raised the tempo. It now fits better with the album
- The following riff changes were derived from the 1989 live show and a handful of reunion shows
- Fixed "Verse B" guitar riff, Tommy plays a tritone here
- Note positions in the Verse and the chorus
- Made several corrections to both solos
title: Masked Jackal

description:
- Added palm-muting
- Added a separate Lead and Clean guitar track
- Made significant note changes (Ex. excessive palm-muted power chords)
- Fixed riffs in the rhythm and bass guitar tracks
- Made minor note shifts
- Added more accurate cymbal work to the drum track
title: Masked Jackal
